title: Jet Black Apple AirPods!
description: Jet Black Apple AirPods (not BlackPods) that match an iPhone 7 DO exist. Enjoy!  Awesome Tech & Gadgets Under $50!  Apple AirPods - 1 Month Later:   For a chance to win one of these custom pairs of Jet Black AirPods (or any custom color you'd like) make sure you're subscribed here on the channel.    I'm also giving away a pair on Instagram and Twitter so follow me below for details on that!       Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:  Twitter:
transcript: - Yo guys, Jonathan here and I'm crazy excited for what is inside this box. To the naked eye, it might appear as if it were everyday run of the mill box-o-AirPods, but on the contrary, what is actually inside here is something exclusive, something you haven't seen before, the world's first pair of jet black AirPods. From there, stackin' it side by side against a jet black iPhone 7, you can see these two are a match made in heaven and it really makes you wish Apple would've released these outta the gate.
